Kaguya-sama: Love is War.author: Aka Akasaka
Kaguya-sama: Love is War.description:
All’s fair when love is war!
Kaguya Shinomiya and Miyuki Shirogane are two geniuses that lead the prestigious Shuchiin academy’s student council. After spending so much time together, they have developed feelings for one another but both are too prideful to be the first to confess since that would be a loss in the competition of love! Who will confess their love first?

My Test Manga.author: Jad
My Test Manga.description:
This fake story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.

What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?

We Want To Talk About Kaguya.author: G3 Iida
We Want To Talk About Kaguya.description: In this 4-koma spinoff of Kaguya Wants to be Confessed to, the members of Shuchiin's Mass Media Club, Erika Kose and Karen Kino, idolize Student Council Vice President Kaguya Shinomiya. This is the comedic tale of two delusional girls who have absolutely no idea what goes on in the Student Council room!

A Matter of Time.author: Ha Yangji
A Matter of Time.description: When her mom gets a new boyfriend, 19-year-old Soohyun decides to move out. In a stroke of luck, her college classmate Yujin offers for her to move in for free, no strings attached. But Yujin has a hidden motive... Will her secret affect their dynamic as roommates?

Lady Beast.author: Swan
Lady Beast.description: To escape her miserable life, the quiet Princess Elisa agrees to an arranged marriage with the war tyrant, Duke Ginger of Randell Kingdom. However, an evil curse suddenly causes them to switch bodies! Can these two opposites learn to understand each other and maybe even find love?

Meat Humans.author: Moraeingan
Meat Humans.description: When all is destroyed, will you persist? Or will you give in to the gray abyss? In a dystopian world, both the gifted and the wretched are making their last attempts at survival. Their struggles are fierce, and their desperation palpable as they work toward one common goal — to survive.
